statements: SELECT * FROM donor_interactions WHERE donor_id = 12345;
SELECT interaction_date, amount_donated FROM donor_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call';
SELECT interaction_type, amount_donated, interaction_date FROM donor_interactions WHERE donor_id = 54321;
SELECT * FROM donor_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, interaction_type FROM donor_interactions WHERE amount_donated > 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM donor_interactions WHERE donor_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, interaction_type, amount_donated FROM donor_interactions WHERE amount_donated > 1000 ORDER BY amount_donated ASC, interaction_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, interaction_type FROM donor_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Email', 'Phone Call') ORDER BY interaction_type, interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM donor_interactions WHERE amount_donated >= 500 ORDER BY donor_id ASC, interaction_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, interaction_date, amount_donated FROM donor_interactions WHERE amount_donated < 1000 ORDER BY donor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM donor_interaction_data WHERE interaction_type = 'Donation';
SELECT donor_id, interaction_amount FROM donor_interaction_data WHERE interaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_id, interaction_date FROM donor_interaction_data ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM donor_retention WHERE retention_status = 'Active';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_retained_donors FROM donor_retention WHERE retention_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM donor_interaction_data WHERE donor_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, SUM(interaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM donor_interaction_data GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT donor_id, interaction_date FROM donor_interaction_data WHERE interaction_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM donor_retention WHERE retention_status = 'active' AND retention_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT donor_id, interaction_type, interaction_amount FROM donor_interaction_data WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%donation%' ORDER BY interaction_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donation_date, donation_amount FROM donor_interaction_data;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_city, donor_state, donor_country FROM donor_attributes;
SELECT donor_id, donation_amount FROM donor_interaction_data WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT donor_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM donor_interaction_data ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donor_city FROM donor_attributes WHERE donor_state = 'California';
SELECT donor_id, donation_date, donation_amount FROM donor_interaction_data;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_city, donor_state FROM donor_attributes;
SELECT retention_id, donor_id, retention_date, retention_rate FROM retention_rates;
SELECT donor_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM donor_interaction_data ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_email, donor_city, donor_state, donor_country FROM donor_attributes WHERE donor_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT trend_description, trend_date FROM trends ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT donor_name, retention_status FROM donors INNER JOIN retention ON donors.donor_id = retention.donor_id WHERE retention_status = 'Active'
SELECT donor_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM donors INNER JOIN interactions ON donors.donor_id = interactions.donor_id
SELECT donor_id, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_date
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT donor_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT donation_campaign, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date, campaign_goal FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2021-10-01';
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_campaign = 'Holiday Drive' ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_goal FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT name, email, phone_number, address FROM donors WHERE donor_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT AVG(retention_rate) AS average_retention_rate, year FROM retention_rates GROUP BY year HAVING AVG(retention_rate) > 0.7;
